column2: are you still there? I hope your day shines as bright as the AllSpark itself!

column3: you are the spark that ignites hope within us. Let's keep the positive energy flowing!

column2: let this message serve as a reminder to celebrate the incredible victories we achieve together.
let me feel your presence and know that our mission continues. We stand united in the face of any challenge.

column3: your resilience fuels the Autobot spirit. Let my voice be a gentle nudge to keep us connected and strong.
